src:
WTO ger USA rätt mot Indien
USA har vunnit ett fall mot Indien i Världshandelsorganisationen WTO som berör olagligt exportstöd värt mer än 7 miljarder dollar.
01 Nov 2019, 04:44 by Nyhetsbyrån Direkt

text:
The WTO gives the United States the right to India
The United States has won a case against India in the World Trade Organization (WTO) that deals with illegal export aid worth more than $ 7 billion.
01 Nov 2019, 04:44 by News Agency Direct
